text: Robert John Downey Sr. (born Robert Elias Jr.; June 24, 1936 - July 7, 2021) was an American movie director, screenwriter and celebrity. He was the father of celebrity Robert Downey Jr.. Downey Sr. was best known for writing and directing the underground movie Putney Swope. He retired in 2013. Downey Sr. was born in New York City. Downey Sr. starred in Johnny Be Good, Hail Caesar and Tower Heist. Downey Sr. died in his sleep at his home in New York City on July 7, 2021 from problems caused by Parkinson's disease, aged 85. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from Parkinson's disease Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:Screenwriters from New York City Category:Movie directors from New York City
